attributes.additional_details:
Dear MPs of All Parties
            I feel it is only right and democrat to give the people of Britain a vote in a referendum whether we stay in or leave the European Union. What we have now is not what the British People voted for back in 1975 it was the common market just a trading nation, now we are being governed by Brussells and it does not benefit Britain whatsoever, it is just a very expensive club,and dictatorship that our MPs have very little control over.
